page.title: 20D-I-Y HOUSE BUILDING
page.content: Our family moved here in August 1983. With the intention of building our own house. We had been down previously and bought a building plot. My Dad and brother had been down in June to site our mobile home and connect it to the electricity, water , sewers and propane gas, there being no mains gas. We did not start building until March 1984. That summer we got the oversite in, and so far this year we have got up to the first floor windows. We hope to have the roof on in six weeks or less. We won't get it plastered out and decorated until next spring. We're all looking forward to it, and we'll certainly be pleased to have a bit more room. Sarah Samson
